description: Main source file for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe application, containing app initialization, theme setup, game state management, UI layout, and game logic.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: TicTacToeHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main game screen, managing game state, UI, and interactions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget tree, including app bar, game board, controls, and status indicators.

methods.name: handleTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping a cell; updates game state and checks for winner or draw.

methods.name: _checkGameStatus
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner or a draw after each move.

methods.name: _hasWinner
methods.description: Checks all win patterns to identify if 'X' or 'O' has won.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the current game board to start a new round, keeping scores.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.description: Resets game scores and board for a full restart.

methods.name: _playerColor
methods.description: Returns the color associated with a player ('X' or 'O').

methods.name: _playerLabel
methods.description: Returns a widget displaying a player label with optional highlight.

methods.name: _turnIndicator
methods.description: Provides visual indicator of current turn or game result (win/draw).

methods.name: _scoreBoard
methods.description: Displays current scores for both players.

methods.name: _gameBoard
methods.description: Builds the responsive Tic Tac Toe grid with interaction.

methods.name: _resetButtons
methods.description: Provides buttons to restart the game or reset scores.
